sentences.translation: “我不敢确定。”她躲躲闪闪地答道。

sentences.sentence: "Until I can speak to your husband I can't come to any conclusion about that," Manuel said evasively.
sentences.translation: “关于那件事情我要跟你丈夫谈了之后才能作出结论，”曼纽尔托辞说。

sentences.sentence: "O, I know, I know, so it is," replied the Rat evasively.
sentences.translation: “噢，我知道，我知道，确实是这么回事。”河鼠推脱道。
